game.name: CubePuzzle
game.shortDescription: 큐브 퍼즐은 모든 장애물을 극복하고 출구에 도달 할 수 있도록,당신은 큐브를 제어하는 흥미 진진한 물리 퍼즐 게임이다. 모든 15+레벨을 완료하기 위해 각 수준에서 작업을 해결,개체 및 제어 파이프를 이동합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cube Puzzle - Think Logically! raise your IQ! Help the cube go through ten levels!

reviewHighlights.text: This game took me roughly 10 minutes to win. I got a score 5390. What does that mean? Couldn't tell you. How to play the game? Not sure. How to exit?...
CubePuzzle is an addictive physics-based puzzle-platformer that will challenge your problem-solving skills. The game's unique gameplay requires you to...
